name: Five Nights at Pizzeria
description:
Your task is to survive these nights, fighting off the attacks of monsters. Hold out until 7 am. Use security doors, turn on the lights, and watch out for security cameras. You can delay monsters as soon as you see them on the monitor. But keep an eye on the battery status, a limited amount of electricity that you can use for your night shift as a security guard.


Features:
- beautiful 3D graphics
- realistic retro pizzeria
- scary atmosphere and music
- use various devices

Can you survive these nightmares?
